creator: ShiaMuslim Project
descriptionHtml:
The comprehensive ShiaMuslim App provides every Muslim with various unique features necessary for daily life.
The main difference between this App and other similar applications is that we strive to supply all contents and features in a single application for shia Muslim Community which is innovative, user-friendly, and can be enjoyed by all Muslims regardless of their various cultural backgrounds.

Main Features
• More than 140 translations in 20 languages.
• Access to translation and transliteration concurrently.
• Access to audio translations while recitation of the Holy Quran is played.
• Recitations of more than 18 favorite Quran reciters.
• Subject based categorization of Surahs and Verses of the Holy Qur’an.
• Customized daily Quran reading section to create the daily Quran habit.
• A collection of more than 6000 documented Ahadith with a new categorizing method.
• A very comprehensive collection of Duas, A’amals, Ziarah, Salat in Mafatih
Section
• Making a Personalized Mafatih including selected duas, a’amals, etc. …
• More than 1200 free books and papers in 9 categories
The Holy Qur’an, Hadith, Beliefs
Ethics, Infallibles, Figh
History, Spirituality, Philosophy
• Access to full version of Nahj al-Balagha: sermons, letters, sayings.
• Sahifah in its full version is available
• Qibla is shown in this section on map and by direction
• Virtual live Ziarah to different holy places
• Dhikr Counter available in Tasbih section
• Ability to record qadha prayers and fasts in Qadha Tracker section
• Gregorian and Hidjry calendar types
• Adjustable Hidjry calendar based on the fatwa of the great scholars
• Access to the most popular Adhans and pre-adhan alarms for download
• Various Azan and pre Azan chants available

Online Istikhara
ShiaMuslim App is delighted to present an online Istakhara service in this platform. Through this service, you are connected to a scholar from howza of Qom or Najaf. You may submit your istikhara request directly on the application, and a scholar from Qom or Najaf will conduct the istikhara for you. Thereafter, you will be informed of the result of your istikhara on the application as early as possible

Media
In the Quran Media in Today section, you will have easy access to beautifully displayed Ayaat of the Holy Qur’an which have been arranged according to various Surahs.
Also in the Hadith Media section you will have access to the most useful ahadith of the prophet and his progeny from Imam Ali until Imam Mahdi (AS)
And in the Dua Media section you will have easy access to the most useful phrases from various Important Duas which have been illustrated using beautiful designs.
These designs and this photography helps us better appreciate and implement the content of these divine teachings in our lives
descriptionShort: Quran, Adhan, Prayer Times, Qibla, Istikhara, Hadith, Dua, Library, Calendar sal

title: Shia Muslim

creator: ShiaMuslim Project
descriptionHtml:
The most comprehensive Shia Muslim App provides every Muslim with various, unique features necessary for daily life.
The main difference between Shia Muslim App and other similar applications is that we strive to supply all contents and features in a single application for Shia Muslim Community which is innovative, user-friendly, and can be enjoyed by all Muslims regardless of their various cultural backgrounds.

Main Features Of Shia Muslim Super-App
Quran
• Smart Khatam Quran
• More than 140 translations in 20 languages.
• Access to translation and transliteration concurrently.
• Access to audio translations while recitation of the Holy Quran is played.
• Recitations of more than 18 favorite Quran reciters.
• Subject based categorization of Surahs and Verses of the Holy Qur’an.
• Customized daily Quran reading section to create the daily Quran habit.

Hadith:
The Hadith section is designed to provide you with all you need concerning the large collection of Shia hadith.
• A collection of more than 6000 documented Hadith with a new categorizing method.
• This method is based on two basic categories, theoretical and practical

Mafatih and Duas:
• A very comprehensive collection of Duas, A’amals, Ziarah, Salat in Mafatih
Section
• Making a Personalized Mafatih including selected duas, a’amals, etc
• Matching text to audio in Duas and Ziarah
• Audio speed control in Duas

Library:
• More than 1200 free books and papers in 9 categories:
The Holy Quran, Hadith, Beliefs
Ethics, Infallibles, Fiqh
History, Spirituality, Philosophy
• Access to full version of Nahj al-Balagha: sermons, letters, sayings.
• Sahifah in its full version is available

Qibla Finder, Live Ziarah, Tasbih, Qadha Tracker:
• Qibla is shown in this section on map and by direction
• Virtual live Ziarah to different holy places
• Dhikr Counter available in Tasbih section
• Ability to record Qadha prayers and fasts in Qadha Tracker section
• Gregorian and Hidjry calendar types
• Adjustable Hidjry calendar based on the fatwa of the great scholars
• Access to the most popular Adhans and pre-adhan alarms for download
• Various Azan and pre Azan chants available

Online Istikhara
Shia Muslim App is delighted to present an online Istakhara service in this platform. Through this service, you are connected to a scholar from hawza of Qom or Najaf. You may submit your Istikhara request directly on the application, and a scholar from Qom or Najaf will conduct the Istikhara for you. Thereafter, you will be informed of the result of your Istikhara on the application as early as possible

Media
In the Quran Media in Today section, you will have easy access to beautifully displayed verses of the Holy Quran which have been arranged according to various Surahs.
Also in the Hadith Media section you will have access to the most useful hadith of the prophet and his progeny from Imam Ali until Imam Mahdi (AS)
And in the Dua Media section you will have easy access to the most useful phrases from various Important Duas which have been illustrated using beautiful designs.
These designs and this photography helps us better appreciate and implement the content of these divine teachings in our lives

descriptionHtml:
The most comprehensive Shia Muslim App provides every Muslim with various, unique features necessary for daily life.
The main difference between Shia Muslim App and other similar applications is that we strive to supply all contents and features in a single application for Shia Muslim Community which is innovative, user-friendly, and can be enjoyed by all Muslims regardless of their various cultural backgrounds.

Main Features Of Shia Muslim Super-App
Quran
• Smart Khatam Quran
• More than 140 translations in 20 languages.
• Access to translation and transliteration concurrently.
• Access to audio translations while recitation of the Holy Quran is played.
• Recitations of more than 18 favorite Quran reciters.
• Subject based categorization of Surahs and Verses of the Holy Qur’an.
• Customized daily Quran reading section to create the daily Quran habit.

Hadith:
The Hadith section is designed to provide you with all you need concerning the large collection of Shia hadith.
• A collection of more than 6000 documented Hadith with a new categorizing method.
• This method is based on two basic categories, theoretical and practical

Mafatih and Duas:
• A very comprehensive collection of Duas, A’amals, Ziarah, Salat in Mafatih
Section
• Making a Personalized Mafatih including selected duas, a’amals, etc
• Matching text to audio in Duas and Ziarah
• Audio speed control in Duas

Library:
• More than 1200 free books and papers in 9 categories:
The Holy Quran, Hadith, Beliefs
Ethics, Infallibles, Fiqh
History, Spirituality, Philosophy
• Access to full version of Nahj al-Balagha: sermons, letters, sayings.
• Sahifah in its full version is available

Qibla Finder, Live Ziarah, Tasbih, Qadha Tracker:
• Qibla is shown in this section on map and by direction
• Virtual live Ziarah to different holy places
• Dhikr Counter available in Tasbih section
• Ability to record Qadha prayers and fasts in Qadha Tracker section
• Gregorian and Hidjry calendar types
• Adjustable Hidjry calendar based on the fatwa of the great scholars
• Access to the most popular Adhans and pre-adhan alarms for download
• Various Azan and pre Azan chants available

Online Istikhara
Shia Muslim App is delighted to present an online Istakhara service in this platform. Through this service, you are connected to a scholar from hawza of Qom or Najaf. You may submit your Istikhara request directly on the application, and a scholar from Qom or Najaf will conduct the Istikhara for you. Thereafter, you will be informed of the result of your Istikhara on the application as early as possible

Media
In the Quran Media in Today section, you will have easy access to beautifully displayed verses of the Holy Quran which have been arranged according to various Surahs.
Also in the Hadith Media section you will have access to the most useful hadith of the prophet and his progeny from Imam Ali until Imam Mahdi (AS)
And in the Dua Media section you will have easy access to the most useful phrases from various Important Duas which have been illustrated using beautiful designs.
These designs and this photography helps us better appreciate and implement the content of these divine teachings in our lives
descriptionShort: Quran, Adhan, Prayer Times, Qibla, Istikhara, Hadith, Dua, Library, Calendar sal

title:
Shia Muslim: Quran Dua Adhan
1.8.0

creator: Yasin.ai
descriptionHtml:
Shia Muslim App: Your Spiritual Companion for Quran, Duas, Prayer Times, Adhan, Hadith, Ziarah and More

The most comprehensive Shia Muslim app, providing essential features for Shia Muslims in daily life. With tools for Quran reading, Shia Duas, Hadith, Prayer Times, Ziarah, Istikhara, and more, this all-in-one platform is designed to meet your spiritual and practical needs.

### Key Features of the Shia Muslim App:

#### Quran Section:
- Quran by Subject: Over 2000 categorized Quran verses for easy access, based on topics like faith, ethics, and Resurrection.
- Quran Khatm: Track your progress and complete your Quran reading journey.
- Over 140 Quran translations in 20 languages, with translation and transliteration available simultaneously.
- Listen to audio recitations from 18+ popular Quran reciters.
- Personalized daily Quran reading section to help you develop a consistent reading habit.

#### Shia Duas & Mafatih:
- A vast collection of Shia Duas, A'amals, and Ziarah from Mafatih al-Jinan.
- Customize your own Mafatih by selecting Shia Duas and A'amals.
- Text-to-audio matching for Duas and Ziarah, with adjustable speed for listening convenience.

#### Hadith Collection:
- Access over 6000+ documented Shia Hadiths categorized into theoretical and practical themes.
- Key Hadiths from Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) and Imams (AS), focused on practical guidance for daily life.

#### Prayer Times & Adhan:
- Accurate Prayer Times for your location, including Azan and pre-adhan alarms.
- Downloadable Azan notifications for all prayer times.
- Qibla Finder to help you find the direction for prayer.
- Gregorian and Hijri calendars, adjustable to the fatwas of top scholars.

#### Online Istikhara:
- Online Istikhara service directly in the app. Submit your Istikhara request, and receive guidance from scholars of Qom or Najaf.
- The result will be provided later, as the Istikhara is conducted by scholars and may require some time for a response.

#### Online Ziarah:
- Virtual Ziarah to sacred places such as the Shia Holy Shrines in Iraq and Iran.
- Experience the spiritual journey with live streams and videos, providing a sense of presence at holy sites for your Ziarah prayers.

#### Shia Library:
- Access over 1200 free Islamic books and papers in 9 categories: Quran, Hadith, Fiqh, Beliefs, History, Ethics, Spirituality, Philosophy, and more.
- Full versions of Nahj al-Balagha and Sahifah available for reading.

#### Radio Podcast:
- Thousands of episodes in various categories: Kids, Learning, Lifestyle, Latmiya, Lectures, Quran Recitation, Podcast, and Anashid.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest episodes for spiritual enrichment and Islamic education.

#### TV Channels:
- Access the most important Shia TV channels worldwide, offering content that enhances your faith and connects you with the global Shia community.
#### Additional Features:
- Dhikr Counter: Track your Tasbih and spiritual practices.
- Qadha Tracker: Record and track missed prayers and fasts.
- Beautifully designed media for Quran, Hadith, and Duas, helping you reflect on the teachings of Islam visually.
---
descriptionShort: Quran, Adhan, Prayer Times, Qibla, Istikhara, Hadith, Dua, Library, Calendar

- Access the most important Shia TV channels worldwide, offering content that enhances your faith and connects you with the global Shia community.
#### Additional Features:
- Dhikr Counter: Track your Tasbih and spiritual practices.
- Qadha Tracker: Record and track missed prayers and fasts.
- Beautifully designed media for Quran, Hadith, and Duas, helping you reflect on the teachings of Islam visually.

creator: Yasin.ai
descriptionHtml:
Shia Muslim App: Your Spiritual Companion for Quran, Shia Dua Duas, Prayer Times, Adhan, Athan, Hadith, Ziarah and More
قرآن القرآن المصحف المؤمن

The most comprehensive Shia Muslim app, providing essential features for Shia Muslims in daily life. With tools for Quran reading, Shia Duas, Hadith, Prayer Times, Ziarah, Istikhara, and more, this all-in-one platform is designed to meet your spiritual and practical needs.

### Key Features of the Shia Muslim App:

#### Quran Section:
- Quran by Subject: Over 2000 categorized Quran verses for easy access, based on topics like faith, ethics, and Resurrection.
- Quran Khatm: Track your progress and complete your Quran reading journey.
- Over 140 Quran translations in 20 languages, with translation and transliteration available simultaneously.
- Listen to audio recitations from 18+ popular Quran reciters.
- Personalized daily Quran reading section to help you develop a consistent reading habit.

#### Shia Duas & Mafatih:
- A vast collection of Shia Duas, A'amals, and Ziarah from Mafatih al-Jinan.
- Customize your own Mafatih by selecting Shia Duas and A'amals.
- Text-to-audio matching for Duas and Ziarah, with adjustable speed for listening convenience.

#### Hadith Collection:
- Access over 6000+ documented Shia Hadiths categorized into theoretical and practical themes.
- Key Hadiths from Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) and Imams (AS), focused on practical guidance for daily life.

#### Prayer Times & Adhan:
- Accurate Prayer Times for your location, including Azan and pre-adhan alarms.
- Downloadable Azan notifications for all prayer times.
- Qibla Finder to help you find the direction for prayer.
- Gregorian and Hijri calendars, adjustable to the fatwas of top scholars.

#### Online Istikhara:
- Online Istikhara service directly in the app. Submit your Istikhara request, and receive guidance from scholars of Qom or Najaf.
- The result will be provided later, as the Istikhara is conducted by scholars and may require some time for a response.

#### Online Ziarah:
- Virtual Ziarah to sacred places such as the Shia Holy Shrines in Iraq and Iran.
- Experience the spiritual journey with live streams and videos, providing a sense of presence at holy sites for your Ziarah prayers.

#### Shia Library:
- Access over 1200 free Islamic books and papers in 9 categories: Quran, Hadith, Fiqh, Beliefs, History, Ethics, Spirituality, Philosophy, and more.
- Full versions of Nahj al-Balagha and Sahifah available for reading.

#### Radio Podcast:
- Thousands of episodes in various categories: Kids, Learning, Lifestyle, Latmiya, Lectures, Quran Recitation, Podcast, and Anashid.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest episodes for spiritual enrichment and Islamic education.

#### TV Channels:
- Access the most important Shia TV channels worldwide, offering content that enhances your faith and connects you with the global Shia community.
#### Additional Features:
- Dhikr Counter: Track your Tasbih and spiritual practices.
- Qadha Tracker: Record and track missed prayers and fasts.
- Beautifully designed media for Quran, Hadith, and Duas, helping you reflect on the teachings of Islam visually.
---
